post.text: If you're voting for Hillary, don't stop there. We need to support Democrats down the ticket to make her vision for America a reality.

comment.author: Angus
comment.text: According to Hillary Clinton, average Americans under investigation by the FBI shouldn't be allowed to buy guns but corrupt politicians investigated by the FBI should be able to run for president and have access to the nuclear codes
